snippet: Tech21 has created a line of phone cases line with D30, super-shock-absorbent material of a type called non-Newtonian polymer that inspires a lot of don't-try-this-at-home stunts, like getting whacked in the head with a shovel through a layer of the...
abstract: Tech21 has created a line of phone cases line with D30, super-shock-absorbent material of a type called non-Newtonian polymer that inspires a lot of don't-try-this-at-home stunts, like getting whacked in the head with a shovel through a layer of the stuff.

headline.main: A Polymer to Protect Phones From Impact
headline.print_headline: Soft to Cushion a Phone, Hard When It Needs to Be
